com.github.fge.jsonschema.metaschema

Class MetaSchema

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.fge.jsonschema.metaschema.MetaSchema

  • public final class MetaSchema
extends Object
    Metaschema main class

    This class centralizes all elements necessary to define a working metaschema. Its elements are:

    • the URI of that metaschema (ie, what schemas written against that metaschema refer to using $schema;
    • (optionally) a raw JSON document representing that metaschema;
    • a set of keywords and format attributes.

    This is the base for all metaschema customizations you might want to do, such as adding custom keywords and format attributes. You can either build a completely new metaschema (using builder() or base yourself on an already existing metaschema (using basedOn(BuiltinSchemas)).

    See Also:
    JsonSchemaFactory.Builder.addMetaSchema(MetaSchema, boolean), BuiltinSchemas
